reviews.name: Olga Gurgurova
reviews.comment: Glad to have met IBWorkout! I train directly from my phone with a personal trainer when it suits me. I just put the child to bed and I'm immediately ready to join the training: this is impossible going to a gym

reviews.name: Olga Pirvu
reviews.comment: Good day everyone! I want to write a review. No, rather thanks to Inna Bogdan. I am one of those people who start to lose weight or get in shape 'on Monday.' As a result, it is not difficult to guess that I never started anything until the very moment I went to Inna's private lessons. Professionalism, a truly individual approach, (and a wonderful person, too!) literally made a miracle! My attitude to sports has changed, I have a desire to train! I've lost weight, tightened up and feel like a different person! THANK YOU SO MUCH INA!

reviews.name: Anna Zausal
reviews.comment: Здравствуйте!  Тренировался у Инны Богдан  в ноябре 2013 года. Основной проблемой было сильное напряжение в спине и шее при выполнении упражнений. Александр очень квалифицированно разобрался в моей проблеме и по итогом тренировок моя проблема была решена! За что огромное ей спасибо!
